analyzed: tasmā rakkhita cittassa sammā saṅkappa gocaraḥ ti gāthā
tasmā rakkhita cittassa sammā saṅkappa gocaraḥ

original: “Sammādiṭṭhipurekkhāro”ti sammādiṭṭhiyā gahitāya gahitāni bhavanti pañcindriyāni, ayaṁ indriyehi otaraṇā.
analyzed: sammādiṭṭhi purekkhāro ti sammādiṭṭhiyāḥ gahitāya gahitāni bhavanti pañca indriyāni ayam indriyehi otaraṇā

original: Tāniyeva indriyāni vijjā, vijjuppādā avijjānirodho, avijjānirodhā saṅkhāranirodho, saṅkhāranirodhā viññāṇanirodho, evaṁ sabbaṁ, ayaṁ paṭiccasamuppādena otaraṇā.
analyzed: tāni yeva indriyāni vijjā vijjuppādāḥ avijjā nirodhaḥ avijjā nirodhā saṅkhāra nirodho saṅkhāra nirodhā viññāṇa nirodho evam paṭiccasamuppādena otaraṇā
sīla kkhandhena samādhi kkhandhena paññā kkhandhena
tāni yā iva pañca indriyāni saṅkhāra pariyāpannāni

original: Ye saṅkhārā anāsavā no ca bhavaṅgā, te saṅkhārā dhammadhātusaṅgahitā, ayaṁ dhātūhi otaraṇā.
analyzed: ye saṅkhārāḥ anāsavāḥ no ca bhavaṅgā te saṅkhārāḥ dhammadhātu saṅgahitāḥ ayam dhātūhi otaraṇā

original: Sā dhammadhātu dhammāyatanapariyāpannā, yaṁ āyatanaṁ anāsavaṁ no ca bhavaṅgaṁ, ayaṁ āyatanehi otaraṇā.
analyzed: sā dhammadhātu dhamma āyatana pariyāpannā yam āyatanam anāsavam no ca āyatanehi otaraṇā
